document.heading: National Capital Medical Center Memorandum of Understanding Approval Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-178, the “National Capital Medical Center Memorandum of Understanding Approval Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-680, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 2004, and May 4, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-428 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-178 became effective on September 8, 2004.
